column5: The United States Senate has just given its assent to the appointment of Judge Amy Coney Barrett to the United States Supreme Court. BREAKING: Amy Coney Barrett is confirmed to the Supreme Court in a 52-48 Senate vote https://t.co/N5sHKOlU5i pic.twitter.com/sJqUQRtEKH — CBS News (@CBSNews) October 27 2020  It’s a win. Enjoy it. And to make it sweeter she’ll be sworn in by Justice Clarence Thomas in just a few hours.
